name: The Queens Jewels
description:
This is a new Hex puzzle game created by Angry Chicken Games.

“The Queens Jewels” is a tetris style hex, puzzle game.
An easy to play, and loads of fun game for all ages.
Move hexs to fill up the patterns, and go on to challenge harder levels.

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the Jewels to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the pattern.
• Your hexs can't be rotated.
• There are no time limits, so don't be in a rush!

FEATURES
• Hex Puzzles.
- Beautiful effect for a hex puzzle game!
- Play easily and quickly.

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 200+ puzzles that are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.

• NO WIFI? NOT A PROBLEM!
- You can play offline in anytime you have a few minutes to beat a level.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)

NOTES
• The Queens Jewels contains the ads like banner, interstitial, and video ads.
• The Queens Jewels is free to play, but you can purchase In-app Hints to help you in the tough patterns.
